title: Good but hypocrites
text:
I enjoy Instagram a lot, seeing other's posts is fun eventhough I don't post so much myself, i'm more of a watcher person.

Now, the reason of the hypocrite part of the title, is because I mean it. I follow a lot of meme accounts and others who post people falling and that cheeze, but often they come up with their own off topic, what I mean with that, is that they post half naked girls, or them doing something weird (or inappropiate to a few, and offensive to girls themselves) same with boys, and then nothing happens to thise posts when they're actually against the Instagram rules.
And instead of warning tyem about it, you guys decide to almost delete an account for having non disgusting, offending, or inappropiate memes, and that's technically not fair to anyone. (eventhough I have seen some inappropiate related memes and y'all still don't do a thing).
I really couldn't care less for the updates or whatever you guys do to the app, but don't be hypocrites, and follow your own rules, and don't be so delicate with a few memes when there is way worse content for others.

title: I HATE IT!!
text: Is Instagram releasing all these updates just to hide all the bad reviews? I‚Äôm going to keep leaving them until you fix the app. I get hopeful every time I see an update, but I‚Äôm still stuck with this hideous version of the app. This update is horrible. Forced dark mode is awful. It hurts my eyes and I can‚Äôt stand how it looks - to the point where I won‚Äôt spend time on the home page of the app. It makes the photos look terrible. What color are the walls in a museum or art gallery typically? White. Because it‚Äôs allows the art to take focus. I also hate the new full screen feature. It feels claustrophobic, and it‚Äôs frustrating to use. There‚Äôs so much junk on the screen! I also hate that I can‚Äôt mute a video by tapping the screen anymore since tapping the screen now pauses reels (just like on TikTok‚Ä¶ what do you know. üôÑ). You can‚Äôt even silence your phone to mute videos! You have to turn your volume all the way down, which messes with the volume of my ringtones and message alerts on my phone! This update is a mess. PLEASE put it back to the way it was (and still is on one of my accounts). People don‚Äôt like these changes. Why are you not listening to us? Twitter is filled with complaints and the App Store is filled with angry 1 star reviews. Just change it back!

title: Cannot put reels on main page after upload
text:
I think it is ridiculous to have a reels page and no option at all what‚Äôs so ever to choose rather you want to put it on your main feed or not! I accidentally removed a reel from my grid that i did NOT want removed and there is no way for me to revert that! It‚Äôs honestly backwards and ridiculous! What is the point of having a Instagram account and posting content if you can‚Äôt even make the choice where you want your content to go! Trying to make my page more catching to the eye and that accidental removal messed up a lot!! I am so annoyed and frustrated. Something so simple that Instagram refuses to do! I will not recant my review or rating until this is fixed

Update%**
This happened yet again and this time I didn‚Äôt even hit the remove button it just went away! This is ridiculous! If Instagram isn‚Äôt going to allow its user to do what they want with their content the please give a second confirmation to make sure it‚Äôs really what the user wants 9/10 it isn‚Äôt!!

title: The new update is terrible, instagram shouldn‚Äôt be a ‚Äúshop‚Äù
text: I don‚Äôt use instagram to shop. This is suppose to be a platform for me to share pictures with my friends and family and express my creativity, not a shopping site for big or small businesses to advertise merchandise. I get it‚Äôs good for small businesses but this isn‚Äôt etsy or depop. If instagram wants to be a shopping site so bad it should launch a separate app, but let normal users such as myself use it for what it‚Äôs meant to be used. Also! Why is the reels button in the middle? The fact that the reels button is in the middle and the shopping button is next to it is so inconvenient. I know many people share my grievances, but i don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just me but i also hate the change in the explore page that i can‚Äôt scroll freely through it, instead only giving me the option to focus on a single post at a time. It‚Äôs ugly and annoying and it makes it harder to reach across my screen with my thumb when i want to like a picture, or harder to read the comments section, especially when I‚Äôm only using my right hand to hold my phone. I know i just went full Karen in my review, but I know I‚Äôm not the only one. Instagram has gotten so ugly and I just wanna share my photos, follow ppl, and look at memes in peace.

title: Political bias
text: You would think that a platform like yours would stop being the political police on Republicans political posts. Why do you continuously block the information we can see or the posts we share on the corruption in the Democratic Party and Joe Biden‚Äôs multi millionaire dollar pay to play scheme with his son Hunter Biden? It‚Äôs obvious you let all kinds of rhetoric and lies the democrats say about President Trump on your platform, with absolutely no fact checking done. And how is it possible to fact check my own post about the Biden‚Äôs corruption in less than a second? I hit post on a factual post that I‚Äôve seen with my own eyes and in a fraction of a second a red I‚Äôve gone against your standards comes up with a threat to kick me off your platform if it happens again. And then if I want to share a post on my messenger you will only let me share it with about 10 of my friends and family. When did you become the world police. Your petty and unhinged and need phycological help with your TDS And hate for smelly deplorable Walmart shoppers. Even with all of you social media warriors on the democrats payroll, President Trump will still be your President and mine for I hope two more terms, since his first term was hijacked by the communist party of the MSM, social media and liberal democrats propaganda machine.

title: Hashtags have been made useless
text:
The recent update has made it to where hashtags are basically obsolete. Each hashtag used to have a top & recent tab, which made it fun to follow hashtags of my favorite topics so I could see newer posts. It also helped me - as well as many other artists - get my art out there. Now with this update, hashtags still have the top tab, but the recent tab has been changed to top recent. I feel like it defeats the whole purpose of hashtags. I don‚Äôt see art that other people have drawn, and people don‚Äôt see mine. Upon looking at my most recent analytics - it got worse. One two separate posts with some shared hashtags - one before the update showed a ton of impressions came from hashtags. The other one, absolute no impression came from hashtags. And while the newer one still did alright by getting onto the explore page, it still was significantly less seen than the post from before the update to hashtags. 

I honestly cannot understand why Instagram would choose to make this change. It hurts artists and creators - especially smaller ones. I know my one review might not be much, but there are plenty of people I‚Äôm talking for with this review. I wish Instagram would just listen

title: No help from scammers
text: I‚Äôm really upset with the way, this company operates. I have an issue where there is a person on here from Nigeria that created a fake profile impersonating me. They have 15,000 fake followers and they even successfully got my account deleted. I‚Äôve had my account since 2013. This account has been around since last October. I was not able to get my account back. This person is literally pretending to be me and scamming money out of my followers and they won‚Äôt do anything to protect me or my followers. I have reported it and everyone I know has reported it and the response that I got was ‚Äúwe‚Äôre too busy to look into this but the AI detects that there‚Äôs nothing bad happening‚Äù. I refuse to put any effort into growing my account on here if they won‚Äôt do anything to help me. Every time I post a picture, a reel or anything else next thing I know the scammer has already download it somehow, and put it on their page. I will not give any more content for this scammer to use. There is no way to contact anybody. No email no phone number not even a chat box I can explain what is happening. I did find an email for copyright claims and I explained everything but never got a reply. This is so frustrating but I can tell they don‚Äôt care, so why should I care about their app.

title: Failure in their 2 factor authentication
text: Generally I would give this app 5 stars. But their attempt at having people secure their accounts is an utter failure. I logged out for the holidays and deleted the app and am entirely unable to get back in. I use the back up codes I was given BY THE APP when I set up 2fa, and they do not work. There is no one to contact for help. Their video selfie facial recognition software does not work (maybe bc the majority of pictures are my kids?). I would gladly provide a copy of my ID but there is no help email to contact. No customer service. Just a help center that utterly fails on every level to help you in any way. If you get through to their privacy department they ignore you rather than transferring to someone who can actually help. I did what I was supposed to do, I screen shot the codes. The system failed. Now I‚Äôm locked out, can‚Äôt respond to messages, can‚Äôt access anything I‚Äôve saved, and I can‚Äôt delete it just to get it off the web. Maybe this is a sign to delete social media entirely, but it does not sit well that I cannot even get rid of the account that I have and I have my children‚Äôs photos on there. Thankfully my account is private. I am so disappointed that in 2023 a company as large as Meta cannot figure this out. It‚Äôs unacceptable.

title: I used to love the app
text:
But a lot has change! I feel like lately the platform is playing with peoples mental health! (I have a lot of friends depressed over this issue Because they have amazing accounts, that for some reason are not getting views at all.
I do influencing and this is my second IG because the other one got hacked and unfortunately lost all of my partnerships! because Instagram didn‚Äôt do anything to help me recover it, they don‚Äôt have a call center or something or someone that can help you with those things so I had to start all over new and now I‚Äôm losing followers like crazy because even with having 70k followers they don‚Äôt show my content to my actual followers at least! and most influencers are buying likes so that brands won‚Äôt stop working with them l! I  just don‚Äôt feel is fair to the brands so literally no one wants to work with me lately because of engagement issues it‚Äôs pretty depressing to work so hard and not get any recognition for it! on a platform that does not help because all they think about is money. Sad

title: Posts I Liked Setting Constantly Disappears
text: & it happens at random! Even while the app is fully up to date! & i have to then proceed to constantly perform troubleshooting steps over and over until it returns. This wouldn‚Äôt matter if this wasn‚Äôt for my business page! I like posts for tips, inspiration, & advice for my work. There‚Äôs no possible way to reach out and get help with this issue either and i see A LOT OF PEOPLE are experiencing the same issue yet have to just deal with it as Instagram hasn‚Äôt provided a method to help or an available line or help to utilize. I will surely find a way to move on from this app as TikTok has proven more reliable as far as contacting support, use, & reaching a wider audience 10 times over. Statistically speaking it‚Äôs far more useful for small business owners. Instagram now consists of people posting their saved TikToks anyways. Tiktok is clearly the better app and Instagram has done nothing to make me feel otherwise aside from greatly inconvenience me.

title: Photo quality and more
text:
Hello,
I‚Äôve been an Instagram user for many years now and I‚Äôve to the realization that each year it seems like the photo quality of the app just keeps on getting worst. To begin, I‚Äôm not posting low quality I ages at all because I do art and I export it with the best quality I can but it seems like it just goes down and becomes more pixilated. I though instagram was an all to share photos and videos or overall content for other or yourself. But it doesn‚Äôt seem to be that way anymore. They focus more on businesses and promoting more items to buy them focusing on bettering the quality first. I‚Äôm not trying to bash people who use the app for only business, what I‚Äôm trying to say is that I wish this app that I grew up with can better the quality for both artist and many others. Because having the resolution drop because the canvas is more than 1500x1500 is kinda bad :/. Also the way they changed the notifications is driving me insane because I keep on clicking on the store options and those little buttons with my fat fingers don‚Äôt work out. 
No hate whatsoever I just wish this app improved on those things.

title: Downgrade with every update
text: I have my settings to automatically download app updates and oh boy did I wish it didn‚Äôt do it for this latest Instagram update....I have had instagram since 2011 and I can‚Äôt believe over the course of the last decade this is the FIRST time I‚Äôm writing a review for an app I use so often. Within the new update, the notifications tab was replaced with a shopping tab. WHY? How can Instagram call itself a photography app to show off creativity when it‚Äôs trying to make itself into a marketplace? And not to mention the crazy amount of ads when you‚Äôre scrolling thru your timeline. This app has succumbed to what I hoped it never would- a product of greed. They have been pushing the idea of ‚Äúshopping thru Instagram‚Äù ALOT this year and whether it‚Äôs poor timing or not, to be frank, I think it‚Äôs insensitive to be pushing down people‚Äôs throats in the middle of a pandemic and a job loss crisis. What Instagram SHOULD be doing is pushing forward a creative platform to inspire people- not just wanting money out of people. All that everyone want‚Äôs is our timeline to be in order and not random. Ever since Instagram got rid of the normal algorithm each update has gotten progressively worse. If my job wasn‚Äôt reliant on this app I wouldn‚Äôt use it anymore. Bring back the roots of this application! Please quit the greed.

title: Little rant
text: Instagram started going downhill when it messed up the order in your feed from chronological order to whatever order it‚Äôs in now. Then they changed it to 4 different steps to see the posts you‚Äôve liked as well as slightly hiding your saved posts. Now instagram is removing some small features that redeemed the app. Scrolling through the explore page is less fluid now that they‚Äôve implemented a feature which ‚Äúsnaps‚Äù you into the next post by barely scrolling (if a picture), if the post was a video it would send you to the post underneath once the video ended. Instagram now takes the ability to see when a chat has been seen. There‚Äôs not too many redeeming features anymore, I like the ability to change the look of the app but I believe that it‚Äôs only for the month of October. I don‚Äôt have a huge problem with Reels like I do Tik Tok but I don‚Äôt like the fact that it‚Äôs kinda shoved in your face the second you go to explore, it does however remain mainly separate from the rest of Instagram which I like. I believe it‚Äôs instagrams responsibility to make its app‚Äôs experience seamless and clear. I‚Äôm not sure why instagram keeps making these changes. Maybe they‚Äôre just mistakes or tests but Instagram needs to stop trying to push all these useless features while removing the ones that redeem it.

title: Temporarily blocked
text: Hear me out, I‚Äôve been using Instagram since it was first made and I never had many problems with it until now. I‚Äôll unfollow people that I don‚Äôt interact with anymore and then I‚Äôll stop when it gives me the message that they‚Äôre limiting how much people can unfollow, follow, etc. then a day or two goes by (of me not unfollowing people, so on) I‚Äôll try to like a picture and it‚Äôll give me the same message or say that I‚Äôm temporarily blocked for having a service that gives me likes and followers. I would understand if I was temporarily blocked for unfollowing people too much or something worse but every-time I‚Äôm temporarily blocked it‚Äôs the same reason, for having a service that gives me likes and follows which it ridiculous because I‚Äôve never had that type of service. I literally can‚Äôt do anything but post stories or reply to dms. Please fix this temporarily blocked situation because it‚Äôs getting out of hand and Instagram acts like celebrities or other people doesn‚Äôt use a ‚Äòservice‚Äô to get likes or followers so I don‚Äôt know why I‚Äôm getting temporarily blocked nonstop. I would give a higher rating but I‚Äôm getting pretty annoyed with this situation and I want it to be fixed.

title: Why Instagram? Why?
text: The option to see users who have viewed Highlights (locates on users profiles) has been removed. It now says ‚Äúviewer lists aren‚Äôt available after 24 hours‚Äù. This is absolutely ridiculous! These ‚Äúhighlights‚Äù are a permanent part of the users profile and NOT just a ‚Äústory‚Äù that goes into IG archives after 24 hours. With a profile public, I should have the right to see who is viewing my highlights at ANY TIME. This was such a great feature and now like everything else, Instagram has ripped it away without users consent or opinion. With the little control users actually have on Instagram nowadays, this was the one feature I truly appreciated. It gave me the ability me to see who was visiting my page with the option to follow, ignore or block. Now we‚Äôre back to the primitive age of Instagram where you can stalk and creep around unnoticed. The users already have relinquished their ability to control endless ads, are forced to have unorganized feeds, and are unable to view stories chronologically. Please start listening to your users. Without us, you‚Äôre nothing and maybe it‚Äôs time to remember that. Please bring back this feature. And furthermore, please stop needlessly changing features that are beneficial to your loyal users.

title: Fan pages.
text: I wont lie, at the beginning this was a really cool app where people from all over the world could come and join. Whether it was an account about them or really anything. About 3 years ago, i made a fan page that became rather popular very quickly. Took me hard work and a lot of time and finally reached about 200,000 followers (Which is a LOT! For a loser like me) it really changed my world. For me it wasn‚Äôt all about the followers, it was just about the people i got to interact with! People from other parts of the world who genuinely liked my page, and my opinions. It was so much fun! Made me have confidence in myself and changed my whole perspective on internet friends. Little did i know that would all come to an end so soon. About a year ago, exact. My account got disabled for copyright, i might‚Äôve posted a pic or two that Instagram thought i shouldn‚Äôt have! I get that, but i was never able to properly talk to Instagram that i had full permission to use those candids. And there, my page is now dead along with so many others whose owners have taken so much time of their lives to update on. Its really sad that Instagram wouldn‚Äôt let u make at least one mistake but rather just deletes them with no questions, no answers, no nothing. I hope they work on this because fan pages MAKE the artist...

title: Scrambled Order of Posts üòí
text: I have used Instagram for ages, and during all those years I have never once had a complaint about the app. But ever since the posts on my newsfeed have been scrambled, I have been missing out on a lot of my followers‚Äô posts, requiring me to scroll for ages just to make sure I‚Äôm caught up, and sometimes I come across posts from friends that were posted maybe three-five (or more) days ago that I‚Äôm just now seeing. It‚Äôs honestly so irritating; it‚Äôs discouraged me from even bothering to scroll through my newsfeed and instead click on specific accounts one by one to make sure I didn‚Äôt miss any posts from them, or turning on post notifications for a bunch of accounts. It‚Äôs a pain, to say the least. Instagram, I really hope you fix this issue. All of these updates for the app and none of them have to do with this major problem. Maybe instead of worrying about issuing new features to your app and mimicking other apps like Snapchat, you should focus on reversing issues that are making your customers unhappy, like the one I‚Äôve addressed, to make Instagram better. It‚Äôs one of the most common complaints amongst IG users; you need to listen to your customers.

title: It‚Äôs great (but...)
text:
Alright so I‚Äôve instagram for probably 5 or 6 years now and it‚Äôs great! I have three accounts and I love how manageable they are and how it‚Äôs so simple to post and search for photos, users, etc. 
My chief complaint is that chronological feed isn‚Äôt an option. It‚Äôs great that Instagram wants to show me the most ‚Äúrelevant‚Äù images according to their algorithm, but the algorithm just does not work for me. The first post that comes up is usually from the last day or so ago but then all of a sudden there‚Äôs some photo from two months ago and I‚Äôve accidentally liked it. Do you realize how awkward that is? In addition, the fact that images aren‚Äôt chronological prevents me from knowing whether or not I‚Äôve seen all my friends new posts. I used to be able to scroll until the last post that I had seen and know for sure ‚ÄúI‚Äôm up to date‚Äù but now I‚Äôm like ‚Äúoh I saw that yesterday... wait the post after it is new... uhhhhh‚Äù so if instagram could please allow an option to use their algorithm or organize posts chronologically, I‚Äôd appreciate it.
 I‚Äôm not asking that we completely return to chronological ordering because some people do like the algorithm, but please I‚Äôd just like an option somewhere.

title: New Update Hurts Small Creators, Especially Artists
text:
I've been using Instagram for the past few years in hopes of posting my art and doing commissions, and I have been pretty disappointed with their recent updates. This latest update has broken hashtags, which was one of the only ways for smaller creators to get their content out there. They've replaced all recent posts under hashtags to all recent top posts, meaning if you already don't have a decent following, your content is going to be pushed aside and not even be featured under said hashtags. It makes hashtags completely useless now, and it's even harder to get noticed as a small artist. I want to be able to make money off of my art work with commissions, but because hashtags have no use anymore, I'm not reaching any new users who may be interested in my art. This goes both ways, since I'm also not finding smaller accounts whom I may be interested in following. 

Instagram was originally about sharing photos, but it's become a weird Tik Tok hybrid trying to leech off of its success. It is disheartening and it feels like Instagram wants to further separate smaller creators from the larger ones. It's gotten to the point where I am seriously considering a different app altogether. Do better, Instagram.

title: Reels are gone
text:
Instagram/Meta, I sent a multiple messages about this reels issue last week, and nothing has changed. You just did and update for bug fixes and performance, but there are still no reels! The reels icon is gone off the bottom bar‚Ä¶ Reels are still not showing up properly on my feed and my for you page. When I‚Äôm sent a reel, or click one on my feed, I can‚Äôt scroll to see more. And there are ZERO reels on my for you page, only photos. This is really frustrating. I just want to watch k-pop reels with out having to search for them, and having to back out of a reel to watch another. Please fix this issue! Ive tried seeing if it was on my end by updating the app and to the latest iOS, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, logged out and back in, cleared history and cache, and turning off my phone, and nothing worked. Like I said, I sent multiple complaints last week, and nothing has changed. I‚Äôve done nothing wrong to deserve this. All I do is like memes, K-pop posts and reels, and share them with two other people. I‚Äôve never posted, or liked anything that is offensive, or breaks any of the rules. I‚Äôve gotten no warnings of anything being removed from my profile. Please fix this on going issue! 

Thank you,

A very upset k-pop Stan/instagram user

title: Won‚Äôt address glitches or provide support

What is up with that??

title: Bloated and annoying now
text:
UPDATE: new layout is HORRIBLE!!!! I don‚Äôt want a ‚ÄúReels‚Äù tab and I sure as heck do not want a permanent ads tab aka ‚Äúshop.‚Äù I will never buy anything off of Instagram EVER. Instagram used to be perfect, but now it's turned into a jack-of-all-trades, but master of none. When you open the app you're immediately eye-screwed with a bunch of information that you may or may not want to see. Long gone is the simplicity of viewing images. Now it's a me-too Snapchat with ads, tabs all over the place, suggestions for annoying junk, and completely distracts you from just viewing photos. The original purpose of the application is completely lost. You tech-guys really live inside a bubble of your own farts. UPDATE: App has more glitches and annoyances than ever. Constantly showing me the same notifications for comments & likes that I have already seen multiple times. You messed it up, Facebook LLC. Ruined the app completely. Was that your goal? Good job, you did it.

2022 update:  It‚Äôs worse. Every other photo or story is an ad. Everything is a video that you don‚Äôt want to see. You will never see any or you friends on your timeline. There‚Äôs too much dumb stuff. They just added cheesy avatars and ‚Äúchat themes‚Äù that are just stealth ads on top of ads. Garbage.

title: The most anxiety-inducing app
text: Instagram feels very unwelcoming and based on inequality more than fairness. They changed the order of Comments again so that it‚Äôs even less chronologically ordered than it was before. Newer comments are so scattered and difficult to find on a post that there‚Äôs no sense revisiting a post anymore, so I‚Äôve spent drastically less time on the app since the latest update. Also, it‚Äôs a worrisome feeling writing a comment and having no idea where Instagram is going to plop it in the order and for what reason. You have no idea if people are reading your comment or if it‚Äôs too far low on the page. Some of the kindest and most encouraging comments from people are towards the bottom of the pile, seemingly because they‚Äôre several sentences long, or because they don‚Äôt have mutual friends with the original poster. The uncertainty of why the faulty algorithm favors certain commenters over others has given me anxiety I‚Äôve never suffered from before, on an app that was originally supposed to be fun and a stress reliever. Now it‚Äôs the complete opposite. A computer algorithm can‚Äôt determine a person‚Äôs worth or the quality of their comment. I‚Äôd rather just watch TV than worry about this anymore. Someone please invent a better app that is actually about pictures and isn‚Äôt so controlled and manipulated by an algorithm.

title: Great App, Stop With The Updates
text:
I want to make it clear that while this is a somewhat angry review, I'm not going to lie and say that this app deserves anything less then 5 stars. It's still intsgram, and it's still heavily loved. I want to be honest, and that's why I've still rated it 5 stars. 

I'm writing this review, however, to express my hatred and frustration toward these terrible updates. Instagram keep changing the layout of the app, and it's annoying, upsetting, and most of all, confusing. Part of all the changes around the layout has been promoting Instagram's new feature. 'Reals', an obvious clone of Tik Toks, are unnecessary. They take up too much space. But what's so bothersome about this feature is the movement of the notification and create post buttons. Both of these have been moved to the home page and replaced with reels and shop. It incredibly annoying to constantly be accidentally clicking on something due to the muscle memory that frequent users have developed.

Please just change things back to how they were. If you'd like to keep reels, move them to the homepage instead.

title: CAN I PLEASE HAVE THE MUSIC NOTES???
text:
Dear Instagram, 

I still do not have the music for my notes and I was wondering if I could please get it already cuz I have been trying everything and everyone already has it and I only have it on my spam accounts and not on my main one and that‚Äôs very disrespectful because I have been a member of Instagram for more than 8 months and I‚Äôm js very emotional because my favorite app has let me down and I feel very betrayed because I always looked up to influencers in the app Instagram and know it‚Äôs just racist because my friends are white and they have the music notes and I‚Äôm Hispanic and I still haven‚Äôt gotten anything and this is js very unfair because I feel very left out and I just want to express how I feel with the my notes and I just think that I‚Äôm probably not good enough because a own app doesn‚Äôt want to give me access to something I really would love to do and I just want Justice for me and everyone else who doesn‚Äôt have the ability to put music on their notes. Thank you so much for your time.

title: instagram fix this
text: instagram recently released an update for people addicted to followers and likes, thus causing hashtags to fail. posts also do not show up in your followers feeds, and instead old posts they have seen will pop up. as well as stories. this new update will NOT help aid the people addicted to likes, which was their own fault. this update also does not aid other creators on the app, for example editors, fan accounts, artists, and many more, either. our work we spend HOURS on will turn into dust. the people we want to share it with will never see it, and we will never be fully rewarded with the amount of effort we put in. another complaint is instagram has been lazy with taking down hate accounts and fraud accounts. only 1 out of the many accounts i have reported had gotten removed. these accounts have included death threats, fraud, suicide claims, etc. my final complaint is the deleting of fan accounts for impersonation. ACTUAL bots and spam accounts have not been taken down, meaning the app does not have their priorities straight. the downside is these fan accounts only want to spread love and find others with the same love. instagram is supposed to be a social app which brings everybody together, not delete the accounts built to do so. please fix this to ensure the safety and light of this app.

title: app won‚Äôt work on my iPhone but will on others
text:
I have an iPhone 7 and I would like to use my instagram on my iPhone but the problem is that it won‚Äôt let me log in. I have deleted the app many many times too many to count and have restarted my phone and nothing will work. I have also emailed and called and even sent them questions asking why won‚Äôt my instagram app work on my iphone, and didn‚Äôt get a response back. It‚Äôs also very strange because I can log into my account and use my instagram on other people‚Äôs iPhones besides mine. I have also followed and read there community guide lines and privacy policy to see if I did anything wrong and I didn‚Äôt. When I try to log into the app with on my iPhone it says ‚Äúsorry, there was a problem with your request.‚Äù I have tried making a new Instagram and I will get a small pop up message on my screen saying you have violated instagrams terms, community guide lines, and privacy policy. I‚Äôll click on it and it‚Äôll take me the the instagram he‚Äôll center and it says that my account may have been disabled but the weird thing is, when I log into my account on other peoples iPhones it works and doesn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs disabled. So if the creator of this app would like to tell me how to fix this issue and let me use the app on my phone then please do. 
        thank you

title: Please get my features on my account that I use a lot.
text:
Dear Instagram,
I really love this app and it is interesting but, I have some bugs. Whenever I use a account I use a lot, I have missing features. For example, the reply, unsending, reaction, poll and changing theme feature. This makes me irritated and I don‚Äôt know why it does this. But on other accounts I HARDLY use, they work. Im honestly disappointed the fact this is happening to me and other people. I don‚Äôt feel like making a new account and restaring all my followers over again too. This is lame and honestly you needa fix your app. I need this fixed immediately!! I also need vanish mode. This is honestly sad for me and others who are experiencing this. Im not about to go make a whole new account just to not get my followers back. Plus, Why is this even a thing? Please fix this. And I‚Äôve had instagram for an year. This account for months because yall suspended my other two. I love this app but yall be doing the most. Last time, there was a bug that the app wasn‚Äôt up for like 3 hours. This bug has to be fixed immediately!! Please.

title: White opening logo screen
text:
I keep as many apps as possible on dark mode. Now when you open the IG app from the last update, a blaring white screen with the logo hits your face first. WHY??? Also loathe the dancing emojis when you select a song for your IG stories for the lyrics. Stop pushing that nonsense on us. I don‚Äôt use those character emojis in my likeness ever. So stupid. Stop making things worse with each update. Some glitches too when trying to move the sticker gifs around on stories. 

Also- my day job involves managing social media accounts and on those accounts, I am limited to weird music artists I‚Äôve never heard of for my story options. The search doesn‚Äôt let me find anything other than these random foreign or unheard of artists- and they‚Äôre not good. We want a commercial appeal for this account with known artists in our country (US). We are an entertainment company. The options given sound like bad Muzak from the 80s.

And as others have complained about, I don‚Äôt care to see influencers and reels dominating my feed. If I wanted that nonsense, I‚Äôd be on TikTok. There‚Äôs a reason I‚Äôve preferred IG all these years. Now it‚Äôs morphing into the platforms I loathe.

title: No support
text: I have submitted multiple reports about an issue on my account. It says my account has been banned from liking and following/unfollowing people due to me using a service to gain more likes/followers‚Ä¶ which I never did. I did however unfollow people on my account using the instagram app, when it decided to log me out of my account and then place this ban on my account. I have as I mentioned submitted multiple reports, the notification of the ban says ‚Äúlet us know if you think we made a mistake‚Äù and I do so by submitting a report. The ban was supposed to be over July 1st and it is still active, not sure why. Anyways I set the app to one star because not only have I received no help, there are no email contacts, phone contacts or live chat supports. All you guys have is the frequently asked questions/help page‚Ä¶. Which if you weren‚Äôt aware is not helpful at all. The overall app is fine but the bugs like this one, lack of support and restrictions on one‚Äôs account are too severe for me to even bump this review up an extra star. I will keep the app in hopes the ban will be lifted however I would like to be contacted about this issue. And I think it would be beneficial that an actual contact for support was added not only for me but for your other users.

title: Unnecessary changes to interface
text: Instagram continues to make changes to their mobile app‚Äôs interface that are neither necessary nor wanted. I find myself constantly frustrated when scrolling through that now posts snap into frame rather than being one continuous roll down the line, because the way I hold my phone means I cant reach the photo to scroll through when there are multiple pictures in one post. The change of where you see the notifications for likes and comments is not convenient and just annoying to deal with. The fact that I have to make the conscious effort to scroll BACK UP to the video I was just watching to watch it again is annoying af (since now it automatically scrolls down once the video is done, thanks for that but I‚ÄôLL decide when I want to move to the next post thanks), and the only reason I still use this platform is to stay updated on the lives of my peers and I refuse to use Facebook. What keeps this from being a 1 star are the interactions I have with random people when we can all add on to memes in the comments section. Call me what you want but when you try to fix something that already works, you just end up breaking it, and instagram, you've pretty much broken the app interface.

title: Awful
text: When I first started using Instagram, it was a good app, and creeps were easy to weed out. Over this past year though, Instagram had been an absolute nightmare. Multiple creeps tried to follow my small private account and I reported them all and they were not taken down. This following week has been the worst. Instagram has restricted my account using shadow blocking for liking and commenting too much. When I wrote a report saying something was wrong I received no help or Explantation. They made me change my password five times in one week. This leonine i got a notification that said I would have to change it again or my account would be permanently restricted, saying I have a service to help me gain more followers, which is absolutely untrue. The whole reason I got Instagram was to post for and with my friends and family and keep a tight small circle of followers. Because if this I Plan to leave Instagram. If they are more concerned with the fact that I‚Äôm liking too many things (which gives them business) more than they‚Äôre concerned with the fact that pedophiles are reported and go free on Instagram, I don‚Äôt want anything to do with an app that supports creeps preying on young people.

title: A platform rapidly declining in quality and user care
text: I have had Instagram for about 5 ish years (since about 8th grade) and this recent year for some reason Instagram has been targeting my account and prompting me to change my password as I have ‚Äúshared it with a website to gain followers‚Äù keep in mind i only have about 9 post and I never have given my passwords to anyone, I don‚Äôt even use the password rememberer on the iPhone. So I agree and change my password every time, this was the 20th time within the last 6 months and I‚Äôm running out of password ideas and it‚Äôs quite draining. Not only that I have been ‚Äúshadow banned‚Äù 5 times and given 1-2 week long bands 3-5 times for no apparent reason then me unfollowing a bunch of European accounts and accounts I don‚Äôt care about. Any attempts to report the problem via the app have ended in failure and the report button has proven to be absolutely useless. I use Instagram as a way to communicate with classmates, colleagues, and potential employers when I could easily be using Facebook,line,Snapchat,Vero, and soooo many more other platforms that wouldn‚Äôt disregard users this way. I‚Äôm very close to not using Instagram at all because of this. I hope you can spare some time to figure out what is happening to my account that triggers your ‚Äúspam?‚Äù Filters and put an end to it.

title: I like instagram though
text: I really enjoyed instagram especially as an instagram editor, though I am annoyed that I have to post a picture with my edit to make since a post and not a reel, I also have been getting glitches and my post don‚Äôt upload even after posting, I also haven‚Äôt been able to upload to my highlights which I regularly do and use it so be can in gashed with my content. And when I upload my edit on here it completely misses up the thumbnail I made for it, thumbnails are important for view in the editing community. I also dislike when my edit is not shown because of the audio and usually audios are what make or break the edits and it seem some are being banned or shown less. I also think we should have a choice of post and reels for videos  especially in the editing community. I also think that adding longer videos more than one minute would be good as well. I also think that having an option of posting and or reel can help us editors push out our content more since our content isn‚Äôt being pushed out as much when it comes to reels well at least for me it‚Äôs hard to grow my page

title: Recent Post Hashtags
text:
For the past few years it‚Äôs become routine for me to check the ‚Äúrecent posts‚Äù option under certain hastings, rather than ‚Äútop posts‚Äù. This is because i love seeking out the newest content and fanart of a given interest of mine, instead of what‚Äôs already the most popular posts. The new update, however, completely undermines this. 

The ‚Äúrecent posts‚Äù option has been replaced with ‚Äúrecent top posts‚Äù, which operates the same way as ‚Äútop posts‚Äù. The issue is that the posts listed under this are completely out of chronological order, which was the point of ‚Äúrecent posts‚Äù in the first place. It was meant for you to see the absolute latest content in order of upload date, regardless of how many likes or interaction they had. Now, there is no option allowing you to browse every post of a hashtag. New posts under a hashtag are now completely invisible to people like me, who have no way of seeing it through the hashtag system. What‚Äôs the point of hashtags if people can‚Äôt even discover you through them? It‚Äôs incredibly frustrating and pointless in my opinion. Please consider undoing this and giving us the ‚Äúrecent posts‚Äù option under hashtags again, to give small creators a chance to be seen. Thank you.

title: üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüíã‚Äçüë©
text: I would probably rate it a five if it didn‚Äôt have problems,,,, it has small problems though,,, but I‚Äôve had Instagram for 4 years and made many & I mean MANY ACCOUNTS and I‚Äôve always noticed that if you were to take a picture for a story and you wanted to add something from like gifs, music, etc Ive noticed something is always missing? like with my old account I made in 2016 it didn‚Äôt have the countdown feature while my new main I made this year doesn‚Äôt have the music feature which is stupid in my opinion. title: New update is awful
text: I absolutely hate the new Instagram update... it‚Äôs very gimmicky and shows that they no longer care about people enjoying a user friendly interface for them to enjoy their social media profiles, but rather now make it into some sort of business platform. The majority of Instagram users created their account to simply connect with friends and access content like news, sports or memes posted by popular pages. Now it feels like my social media account is part of some online shopping website, which is absolutely not what I wanted. Nearly every on the internet you see advertisements for products, and Instagram even had accounts that had links to online shops before, but it was hidden enough to where you could feel like you weren‚Äôt harassed by companies trying to sell you products. But now it‚Äôs so blatant that Instagram only cares about money and selling products or promoting business, which is not what social media was created for. So many apps are created for the communities benefit and solely based on giving them the best experience for them to enjoy... but eventually they just use their popularity to create more revenue and destroy the true unique user experience that made it so popular to begin with. I really hope they revert to the older format... probably not thought

text:

title: It's a meme app with spam
text:
As of April 18, app keeps crashing when loading stories
------
I remember when people posted quality content on Instagram. Then came the age of the selfies, and now it's the memes. That's all I see on the explore page. Not a fan. I'd like a filter so I can choose quality posts. I also get at least 5 request a day for followers from accounts that display pornography or are lewd in other aspects. How about adding a filter as to what can be posted in the bio section? If keywords are caught, the account can't be created. I put my account on private just so I don't have these types of followers. I'm not a prude but I have an image to keep and don't want these types of followers. There's also a high rate of stealing others pictures. I would love if there was a feature that automatically added a watermark (or logo) somewhere on the post with the account name so if anyone steals it, there is evidence where it came from (See the app: VOUN as they do a signature option). I hate that the posts are out of order now. It makes no sense. If I wanted to see someone's specific post, I'll go to their account. I don't need them to appear on the top because they posted something once or twice that I liked. Now I miss half of the posts. I even stopped liking posts so posts don't appear out of order.

title: New update / format
text:
New review:
I‚Äôm tired of Instagram trying to shove new content in my face on my feed and showing me less of people I actually follow. I actively use reels and the explore page, but lately new accounts I don‚Äôt follow pop up in my feed as ‚Äòsuggested‚Äô and most of the time it‚Äôs content that‚Äôs not my style and I find annoying, so I use the feature to ‚Äòsuggest less like this.‚Äô This morning I got the same thing, but this time there wasn‚Äôt a feature to say I dislike it. No thanks, I‚Äôll just take a break and delete the app until they fix it, or I‚Äôll just stop using entirely. 

Older review:
The new format just removed the remaining good parts of Instagram, now I just get instantly annoyed once I open it. Gonna delete off my phone to save myself a headache. Update: it‚Äôs been maybe three weeks and the IG on my iPad finally went back to normal so I decided to redownload on my phone - still terrible. I hate the scroll jump and that videos don‚Äôt have the mute button so I deleted it again. My friends haven‚Äôt had their account change to the new format yet and they don‚Äôt want it to. Hopefully the IG team accepts this loss and focuses their efforts on upgrades that‚Äôll actually be wanted from users.

title: Not properly removing racist comments
text: Somehow Instagram just seems to keep getting worse? I‚Äôve been using instgram for several years now. Recently I‚Äôve been seeing a lot of racist comments and I‚Äôve been reporting them however there is no category for racism. So I put it under bullying/harassment. Few days later I get a review saying that there‚Äôs nothing wrong with the comments and that they can‚Äôt remove them. Which is awful. Instagram claims to want to be a safe environment for everyone. And yet they seem to condone racism especially toward Asian people! They also began to remove my comments that i left for a sex bot on a meme page comment section. Not even 5 seconds after commenting my joke Instagram sent a message saying that my comment was bullying and harassment(it was not at all). Instagram please remove actually problematic racist comments rather than protecting your sex bots. Also you allow accounts to post actual videos of violence but threaten to remove my account for leaving ‚Äúsomeone plz punch him fr fr‚Äù which isn‚Äôt even that severe and I‚Äôve seen much worse that was toward Asian people that has been deemed ‚Äúnot against community guidelines‚Äù. And the video was about a guy cheating on his gf and showing no remorse. Y‚Äôall are honestly awful. Very disappointed.

title: HACKED ACCOUNT NO WAY TO RECOVER
text: Hello Instagram team, I am writing this review because I find it really hard to believe that you guys have no way of being contacted. About 3 months ago my Instagram account was hacked by people on YOUR platform. I have gone to the Help Center online and have followed the instructions to submit a request form but EVERY TIME i click on ‚ÄúTry Another Way‚Äù it just prompts me back to the Help Center. It takes me in circles and it‚Äôs frustrating . I have filled out the form online about how you can better your Login, but I have had zero response. I have waited patiently for someone to hopefully get back to me. However, I am starting to grow impatient because whoever hacked my account is ACTIVELY still impersonating me. They continue to reach out to MY followers in order to scam them. I really hope you guys do something about this because it is happening on your platform. I know countless people who have been hacked and have no way of contacting you guys. I wish there was someone from Instagram who could please help me. I am growing desperate and the fact that someone has had access to my account for this long is really starting to scare me. Please Instagram Team i ask for your help. Thankyou for reading this and i hope you guys have a wonderful day!

title: For what it is, it‚Äôs alright
text: The basis of the app, posting and sharing pictures presumably with your friends is fine, it‚Äôs just everything else that‚Äôs the problem. For some reason there‚Äôs a store now? Don‚Äôt see why that was necessary. The ads are shoveled down your throat, not to mention that Instagram blatantly takes information from you to give you ads on what you might want. They aren‚Äôt even trying to hide it anymore, you can google an item you may be interested in and sure enough it‚Äôll be an ad in your feed minutes later. Not to mention the app listens to you talk to give you ads, anyone can try this, just talk about something with the app open and watch it appear as an ad. You might think I‚Äôm joking but many many times of my personal experience would beg to differ. Plenty of censorship on the app too, ‚Äúfact checkers‚Äù they call them. Typically they just put it on posts that are controversial rather than things that can easily be proven true or false. Oh if you mention anywhere on your post about the virus it puts a tab link to information about it. I could look past the fact checkers and all that but the ads are really what get me, wayyy too many and wayyy too personal.

title: This app definitely doesn‚Äôt deserve 4.8 stars.
text: I appreciate that this app is centered around photos, because I‚Äôm a photographer. However, the app is constantly and randomly blocking my actions so I can‚Äôt use it properly. This is especially frustrating because there seems to be no real Instagram Support that you can reach. You can report problems, but I‚Äôve never had a response from Instagram when I report an issue. I appreciate and enjoy the app but I hate that I can‚Äôt use it half of the time for no reason at all. The constant and random blocking doesn‚Äôt just happen to me, it happens to my friends and family, too! Makes me want to delete the app altogether because I can‚Äôt use it most of the time anyway. And there are ‚Äúindependent fact checkers‚Äù on the app that label the truth as misinformation and then they censor posts entirely to block you from reading the information. Even if the information IS false, I should be able to read it and make that decision myself! I don‚Äôt need an ‚Äúindependent fact checker‚Äù to ‚Äúresearch‚Äù (aka provide one article from a non-credible source) and think for me! I really wish there was any alternative. As soon as an alternative becomes available to me, I will definitely switch over because I‚Äôm fed up with the information-censoring and horrible ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù at Instagram.

title: Can‚Äôt post on instagram
text: Almost a year ago in July of 2019 Instagram took away my ability to view likes. This has been very hard on my life, especially when I couldn‚Äôt find another user experiencing the same misfortune that I had not signed up for. They took away a very small group of users ability and let the vast majority of users still have the ability to view everybody‚Äôs likes still. This is hurting my mental health, I haven‚Äôt been able to post a picture on my instagram since July of 2019 because I don‚Äôt know how many likes my friends are getting on average so how could I possibly post a picture and not worry about the likes that everyone can still seem. Instagram a small test is not over 10 months!!! You need to haunt this experiment or take away EVERYBODYS ability to see likes but you can‚Äôt do that cause you know all the backlash you‚Äôre going to get but if you just do it to people that don‚Äôt have a voice themselves you can‚Äôt get away with anything and hurt all these people‚Äôs mental health. Did you get this psychological experiment approved by the board, because this really doesn‚Äôt seem ethical. Please fix instagram it‚Äôs made me think about just ending my life now if I have no hope of it ever returning to the way I once knew. Let me see likes.

title: I think it needs a LOT more improvement
text: Hey, I‚Äôm a kid. And I‚Äôm being completely honest with my birthday and all of that logging in stuff. But I‚Äôve rand into a LOT of issues with the overcome.
